hibernate-mapping.query: select new townshipCodedto( t.Township_Code, t.Description, t.UserNo, t.Date_Time, t.EditDate_Time, t.EditUser, t.Edit_Type ) from PFMORM00005 as t where (t.Township_Code =: townshipCode or t.Description =: desp) and t.Active = true

select new townshipCodedto( t.Township_Code, t.TS, t.Description, t.UserNo, t.Date_Time, t.EditDate_Time, t.EditUser, t.Edit_Type, t.Active, t.CreatedDate, t.CreatedUserId, t.UpdatedDate, t.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00005 as t where t.Active = true

select new townshipCodedto( t.Township_Code, t.TS, t.Description, t.UserNo, t.Date_Time, t.EditDate_Time, t.EditUser, t.Edit_Type, t.Active, t.CreatedDate, t.CreatedUserId, t.UpdatedDate, t.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00005 as t where t.Township_Code = :townshipCode and t.Active = true

select new occupationCodedto( o.Occupation_Code,o.Description,o.UserNo,o.Date_Time,o.EditDate_Time,o.EditUser,o.EditType,o.Defaults ) from PFMORM00004 as o where ( o.Occupation_Code =: occupationCode or o.Description =: desp ) and o.Active = true

select new occupationCodedto( o.Occupation_Code, o.Description, o.UserNo, o.Date_Time, o.EditDate_Time, o.EditUser, o.EditType, o.Defaults, o.Active, o.TS, o.CreatedDate, o.CreatedUserId, o.UpdatedDate, o.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00004 as o where o.Active = true

select new occupationCodedto( o.Occupation_Code, o.Description, o.UserNo, o.Date_Time, o.EditDate_Time, o.EditUser, o.EditType, o.Defaults, o.Active, o.TS, o.CreatedDate, o.CreatedUserId, o.UpdatedDate, o.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00004 as o where o.Occupation_Code = :occupationCode and o.Active = true
